content: you will need circular needles size us 4 3 5 mm and us 8 5 0 mm both in 40 100 cm lengths as well as a needle for sewing together finished measurements bust circumference 35 37 75 41 75 45 5 88 96 106 116 cm finished length 20 20 75 21 5 22 51 52 5 54 56 cm sleeve seam 17 75 45 cm for all sizes yarn used feeling good yarn shown in shades ivory white and cameo rose - 6 6 7 8 balls pattern file has english german and french versions all in one document
